name: Monochrome Temple
description:
You've been cursed! Turned black and white, you can't see any color. Outraged, you enter the Monochrome Temple, home of the evil brute who cursed you like this! Take him out and get your color back!

Currently at v1.0.0
Made with Godot

Instructions
  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move
  • Space to shoot
  • LMB to shoot
  • Hold RMB to pan camera
Credits
  • Programming by Efigi
  • Graphics by Kenney
